Package unlimitedwordle

Class WordleGame

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
unlimitedwordle.WordleGame
Record Components:
gameScene - sets the game scene with grid and keyboard
gameControl - vertically sets the music button and score option along with additional controls
additionalControls - sets the newgame and exit buttons in a horizontal aspect
difficultyLevel - passes the value of difficulty
playGame - initializes the backend for changing difficulty level and chosing words based on difficulty level
welcomeUser - contains start scene display
musicButton - starts the music
startGame - button allows the user to move from start scene to game scene
gameTitle - displays "Wordle Game"
newGame - allows users to choose difficulty levels
exitButton - allows users to exit the game
guessingGrid - initializes the grid based on the difficulty level
keyboard - for creating the keyboard.
public class WordleGame extends javafx.application.Application
WordleGame maintains the UI of the application Sets up the interface with all the required components

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    buttonClickKey(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    buttonClickKey() is used for event handling of the keyboard and prevent the user from going back to the previous row if evaluation of the grid was done.
    Grid
    createGameLevels(String difficultyLevel)
    createGameLevels() is used to create game scenes depending on the difficulty levels chosen by the user It also chooses the word based on the difficulty level chosen
    void
    difficultyClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    difficultyClickEqual() receives information from the combobox and stores the value of the button click
    private void
    endGameScene()
    endGameScene() is used to end the game and display the score of the user

      private boolean validateDifficultyClick()
      validateDifficultyClick() is used to validate if the user has picked a difficulty level and throw an error if they haven't picked one before pressing play game.

      public void showConfetti()
      showConfetti() is used to show the confetti when the user wins the game by correctly guessing the word.

    • playMusic

      private void playMusic(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      playMusic() allows user to play music on the basis of their preference of having music on or off.

    • soundEffects

      private void soundEffects(String gameStatus)
      soundEffects is used to set the sound effects for when the user has won the game or when they've lost the game. It is also used to set the sound effects for the entry and exit scene.
